title: Choux buns with salted caramel sauce
ingredients: ['For the salted caramel sauce', '150g caster sugar', '200ml single cream', '80g salted butter', '1 teaspoon fleur de sel (or other fine sea salt)', 'Choux pastry', '4 tablespoons milk', '4 tablespoons water', '2 tablespoons caster sugar', '60g salted butter, cut into cubes', '70g plain flour', '2 eggs', 'For the filling', '200ml whipping cream, whipped or homemade creme patissiere']
